product_name: Novara Forza Road Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: Novara Forza road bike shorts feature 8-panel construction for an anatomic, bike-friendly fit. New chamois provides sustained comfort for the daily commute or weekend training rides. 4-way stretch fabric and 8-panel construction provide support for hard-working muscles; moisture-wicking, quick-drying finish increases comfort. Novara Sport chamois features a microfiber covering that wicks moisture away; smooth, sonic-welded seams reduce friction. Precurved chamois conforms to your body's contours with a layer of open-cell foam and a thin bottom layer of shock-absorbent foam to enhance comfort in the saddle. Ultrasoft, breathable chamois is fully elasticized for added flex and stretch. Mesh panel on backside enhances airflow. Flatlock seams eliminate chafing. Silicone elastic grippers keeps hems from riding up. Reflective accents increase visibility. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays.
